title: Thumbs vs. Swiping: How to Type Faster on Mobile
description: Mobile typing is different. We compare two-thumb typing against gesture typing (swiping) to see which is faster.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
Two Thumbs

Generally faster for most people. Requires a large enough phone.

Glide/Swipe Typing

Great for one-handed use. Predictive text AI has made this incredibly accurate.

Tips

Use text expansion shortcuts for emails and addresses. Turn on haptic feedback for confirmation.
